versions.name: Execution with Explicit Credentials via Scripting v100.0.0
versions.description: Identifies execution of the security_authtrampoline process via a scripting interpreter. This occurs when programs use AuthorizationExecute-WithPrivileges from the Security.framework to run another program with root privileges. It should not be run by itself, as this is a sign of execution with explicit logon credentials.
author: Elastic
versions.query:
event.category:process and event.type:(start or process_started) and
 process.name:"security_authtrampoline" and
 process.parent.name:(osascript or com.apple.automator.runner or sh or bash or dash or zsh or python* or Python or perl* or php* or ruby or pwsh)
